name: Escapefeb
description:
Escapefeb(Prototype) is a movement based puzzle game. 

Escapefeb is a story-based puzzle game that is the result of a 72 hours game-jam.  It is developed by a single person. Since It is a prototype project, this version of the game needs to be completed in later progress and very far away from the whole game. If you would like to support the future of this game and see a complete version; please do not forget to rate the game, share with your friends and you can consider donating if you would like. Also, I would like to hear your feedback if you have any. Thanks for playing. <3

Gökay Akçay / Project Manager,Programmer,2D-Pixel Artist, Level Designer

Note: Music and effects are taken from an open-source website.
